Category:Journey to Star Wars: The Force Awakens
Category:Tales from a Galaxy Far, Far Away: Aliens: Volume I

nodes.text: "The Face of Evil" is a short story by Landry Q. Walker that was published as an eBook on December 1, 2015, and in print inside the anthology Tales from a Galaxy Far, Far Away: Aliens: Volume I on April 5, 2016. The story was written in a horror style.
A notorious thief learns to be careful what she wishes for on Takodana.
